|       type="text"
|       this.value=""
|       <shadow:root>
|         <div>

|       id="foo"
|       "
  foo"
|       "   bar
"

|       "foo.firstChild.splitText(6);"
|     "

|       "foo"

window.getSelection().selectAllChildren(bar)
